entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
